Red Legends.name: Red Legends
Red Legends.text: You have at least 2 upgraded pieces on red squares, and at least 1 of them is legendary.

Imprisonment.name: Imprisonment
Imprisonment.text: You have at least 6 pieces adjacent to the same enemy piece.

Green Legends.name: Green Legends
Green Legends.text: You have at least 2 upgraded pieces on green squares, and at least 1 of them is legendary.

Rainbow Dominance.name: Rainbow Dominance
Rainbow Dominance.text: You have more upgraded pieces on red squares and more upgraded pieces on green squares than your opponent does.

Green Summoning.name: Green Summoning
Green Summoning.text: You summoned at least 2 beings this turn, at least 1 on a green square.

Red Summoning.name: Red Summoning
Red Summoning.text: You summoned at least 2 beings this turn, at least 1 on a red square.

Devastation.name: Devastation
Devastation.text: You destroyed at least 4 enemy pieces this turn.

Envelopment.name: Envelopment
Envelopment.text: You have at least 7 pieces adjacent to the same enemy piece.

Red Conquest.name: Red Conquest
Red Conquest.text: You have at least 3 pieces on red squares, and at least 2 of them are upgraded.

Central Dominance.name: Central Dominance
Central Dominance.text: You have at least 5 pieces on the nine central squares, and at least 2 of them are upgraded.

Green Conquest.name: Green Conquest
Green Conquest.text: You have at least 3 pieces on green squares, and at least 2 of them are upgraded.

Heroic Devastation.name: Heroic Devastation
Heroic Devastation.text: You destroyed at least 4 enemy pieces this turn, at least 2 of them upgraded.

End of Legends.name: End of Legends
End of Legends.text: You destroyed at least 1 legendary enemy piece or 2 heroic enemy pieces this turn.

Color Conquest.name: Color Conquest
Color Conquest.text: You have at least 5 pieces on red and/or green squares, and at least 3 of them are upgraded.

Line Dominance.name: Line Dominance
Line Dominance.text: On one of the orthogonal lines through the central squares, you have 6 more pieces than your opponent does.

Center Cross.name: Center Cross
Center Cross.text: You have at least 5 pieces on the central squares in a + or x pattern.

Legendary Summoning.name: Legendary Summoning
Legendary Summoning.text: You summoned at least 2 beings this turn, at least one of them legendary.

Isolation.name: Isolation
Isolation.text: An enemy piece is within 2 squares of another enemy piece, but it cannot get adjacent to any enemy piece in 3 or fewer moves through empty squares.

Heroic Destruction.name: Heroic Destruction
Heroic Destruction.text: You destroyed at least 3 enemy pieces this turn, at least 1 of them upgraded.

Diagonals.name: Diagonals
Diagonals.text: You have at least 4 pieces on each diagonal, and at least 1 of your pieces on each diagonal is upgraded.

Corner Chain.name: Corner Chain
Corner Chain.text: Squares in two opposite corners of the board are connected by a chain of your pieces.

Destruction.name: Destruction
Destruction.text: You destroyed at least 3 enemy pieces this turn.

Side Chain.name: Side Chain
Side Chain.text: Squares on two opposite sides of the board are connected by a chain of your pieces.

Colored Summoning.name: Colored Summoning
Colored Summoning.text: You summoned at least 2 beings on red and/or green squares this turn. (Both of them may have been summoned on the same square.)
